sp_widget.name: VFS Get Details
sp_widget.template:
<style>
  .style-0 {
    position: relative;
    left: 30px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0px;
    padding: 0px;
    border: 0px none rgb(0, 0, 139);
    outline: rgb(0,0,139) none 0px;
    font-size: 9px;
    vertical-align: baseline;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box;
  }

  .style-1 {
    margin: 0px 0px 20px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 0px;
    border: 0px none rgb(0,0,139);
    outline: rgb(0,0,139) none 0px;
    font-size: 9px;
    vertical-align: baseline;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box;
  }

  .style-2 {
    font-size: 30px;
    line-height: 30px;
    color: rgb(0,0,139);
    font-family: Arial;
    margin: 0px 0px 20px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 0px;
    border: 0px none rgb(139,0,0);
    outline: rgb(139,0,0) none 0px;
    vertical-align: baseline;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box;
  }

  .style-3 {
    margin: 0px 0px 25px;

    padding: 0px;
    border: 0px none rgb(33, 37, 41);
    outline: rgb(33, 37, 41) none 0px;

<div class="style-0">
  <div class="style-1">
    <div class="style-2">Select Type</div>
    <div class="style-3">

      <div class="style-4">
        
        <div class="style-7"><span class="style-8"> <br class="style-9" /></span></div>
      </div>
      <div class="style-10">
        <div class="style-11">
          <div class="style-12">
            <input type="radio" name="radio-group" checked="" value="Single" class="style-13" /> <label for="single_trip" class="style-14">Single Trip</label>
          </div>
          <div class="style-15">
            <input type="radio" name="radio-group" value="Multi-Trip" class="style-16" /> <label for="round_trip" class="style-17">Multi Trip</label>
            <div class="style-18">

              You are now opting for a Multi-trip plan. However, please note that this plan will cover you for a maximum of 60 days/trip
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="style-19">
            <input type="radio" name="radio-group" value="Annual-Trip" class="style-20" /> <label for="annual_trip" class="style-21">Annual Trip</label>
            <div class="style-22">
              Uninterrupted single trip cover for 365 days
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="style-23">
            <input type="radio" name="radio-group" value="Student" class="style-24" /> <label for="student_trip" class="style-25">Student</label>
            <div class="style-26">
              Uninterrupted single trip cover for 365 days
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="style-27">
      <div class="style-28">
        <div class="style-29">
          <label class="style-30">Enter your travel region</label>
          <!----><select name="ddltravelregion" class="style-31">
          <option value="Excluding USA & Canada" class="style-32">
            Excluding USA & Canada
          </option>
          <option value="Including USA & Canada" class="style-33">
            Including USA & Canada
          </option>
          </select>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="style-34">
    <div class="style-35">Set Timeline</div>
    <div class="style-36">
      <div class="style-37">
        <div class="style-38">
          <label class="style-39">Start Date</label> <input type="text" placeholder="dd/mm/yyyy" class="style-40" name="txtStartDT" autocomplete="off" />
        </div>
        <div class="style-41">
          <label class="style-42">End Date</label> <input type="text" placeholder="dd/mm/yyyy" class="style-43" name="txtEnddt" autocomplete="off" />
        </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="style-48">
    <div class="style-49">Choose People</div>
    <div class="style-50">
      <div class="style-51">
        <div class="style-52">
          <label class="style-53">Travellers</label> <select name="ddlTravellers" class="style-54">
          <option class="style-55">1</option>
          <option class="style-56">2</option>
          <option class="style-57">3</option>
          <option class="style-58">4</option>
          </select>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="style-59">
      <div class="style-60">
        <div class="style-61">
          <span class="style-62">DOB of traveller 1</span> <input type="text" placeholder="dd/mm/yyyy" name="txtDTTraveller1" class="style-63" autocomplete="off" />
        </div>
        <div class="style-64">
          <span class="style-65">T1 Age</span> <input name="txtAgeTraveller1" type="text" class="style-66" readonly="readonly" autocomplete="off" />
        </div>
      </div>
    <div class="style-88">
      <div class="style-89">Are you an Indian passport holder?</div>
      <div class="style-90">
        <div class="style-91">
          <div class="style-92">
            <input type="radio" name="radio-group-1" value="Yes" checked="checked" class="style-93" />
            <label for="yes_passport" class="style-94">Yes</label>
          </div>
          <div class="style-95">
            <input type="radio" name="radio-group-1" value="No" class="style-96" /> 
            <label for="no_passport" class="style-97">No</label>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
        <input type="submit" name="btnSubmit" value="Continue" disabled="disabled" class="style-110" />
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
